links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n)=binomial(n+8, 8)*A000984(n+8)/A000984(8), A000984: central binomial coefficients - from _Wolfdieter Lang_.a(n) = ((2*n+15)*(2*n+13)*(2*n+11)*(2*n+9)*(2*n+7)*(2*n+5)*(2*n+3)*(2*n+1)/2027025)*Binomial(2*n, n). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 05 2013
prog: (MAGMA) [&*[2*n+i: i in [1..15 by 2]]*Binomial(2*n, n)/2027025: n in [0..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 05 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
